description.english: Be on fire, poisoned, and bleeding at the same time.
description.german: Stehe in Flammen, sei vergiftet und blute zur gleichen Zeit.
description.french: Souffrir simultanément de brûlure, de poison et d'hémorragie.
description.italian: Sii in fiamme, avvelenato e sanguinante allo stesso tempo.
description.spanish: Estar en llamas, envenenado y sangrando al mismo tiempo.
description.schinese: 身上同时具有燃烧、中毒和流血效果
description.tchinese: 身上同時具有燃燒、中毒及流血效果
description.russian: Получите 3 статуса в одно и то же время: горение, отравление, кровотечение.
description.japanese: 同時に炎の上で、毒にかかり、出血する
description.portuguese: Esteja em chamas, envenenado e sangrando ao mesmo tempo
description.polish: Stań w ogniu, miej krwotok i bądź pod wpływem trucizny jednocześnie.
description.turkish: Aynı zamanda hem yan, hem kana ve hem de zehirlen.
description.brazilian: Fique em chamas, sob efeito de veneno e sofrendo de uma hemorragia ao mesmo tempo.
